description: The Get Deleted Sas Definitions operation returns the SAS definitions that have been deleted for a vault enabled for soft-delete. This operation requires the storage/listsas permission.

storage_account_name.description: The name of the storage account.

maxresults.description: Maximum number of results to return in a page. If not specified the service will return up to 25 results.

value.description: A response message containing a list of the deleted SAS definitions in the vault along with a link to the next page of deleted sas definitions

nextlink.description: The URL to get the next set of deleted SAS definitions.
